plugins.name: Mikrotik Monitoring
plugins.description: This plugin is created to monitor Mikrotik Router from PHPNuxBill and its features include: Router System Information, Interface Monitoring, Online Hotspot Users, Online PPPoE Users. e.t.c
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Mikrotik Import
plugins.description: Import existing Mikrotik Hotspot Package and User to PHPNuxBill. This script will import Users and Profiles, but will not add active packages to user.
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: Internet Speed Test
plugins.description: Speedtest plugin is designed to provide users with an easy and efficient way to measure their internet connection speed directly through the PHPNuxBill interface.
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Tripay View Payment
plugins.description: Dengan Plugin ini, Pembeli tidak akan diarahkan ke Web Tripay, instruksi pembayaran akan langsung ditampilkan.
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: Port Tester
plugins.description: Check if your server block some port.
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: System Information
plugins.description: The plugin is used to monitor system or server performance, check running services
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Extended Database Backup and Restore
plugins.description: This Plugin is used to create database backup, restore, and download, but it is still in development, it has a lot of bugs and needs to be fixed, you can pull a request if errors or bugs, and it will be maintained from time to time
plugins.author: Focuslinkstech

plugins.name: Radius online user viewer
plugins.description: To see whos online, and can disconect the user
plugins.author: Gerandonks

plugins.name: Whatsapp Gateway
plugins.description: Whatsapp Gateway Client Multiple Phone Number, random send.
plugins.author: ibnux

plugins.name: IPDR Plugin | Paid Plugin
plugins.description: Internet Protocol Detail Record (IPDR) to log Customer activity, Works with Hotspot, PPPOE, and radius. To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication
plugins.author: ibnux

payment_gateway.name: umspay

payment_gateway.author: Alvin Kiveu

payment_gateway.name: Thawani
payment_gateway.description: Thawani Pay app is the simplest, smartest, and most secure way to manage your finances anywhere, anytime. Link up to five bank cards within the app, top up your Mojab wallet, pay utility bills, buy gift cards, and more features. Explore Thawani app today and enjoy the experience.
payment_gateway.author: Abdalrahman Molood

payment_gateway.name: Stripe | Paid Plugin
payment_gateway.description: Payment Gateway Stripe.com, paid plugin, To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication
payment_gateway.author: ibnux

devices.name: Voucher
devices.description: Customer can buy Voucher, it can activate later or give it as a Gift. Only for PHPNuxBill Version 2024.8.8 and above
